<!-- Photography Portfolio Site -->

## Project Overview

A React TypeScript sports photography portfolio site for Studio Storm with:

- Masonry grid gallery layout
- Individual photo detail pages
- Sports albums (Atletiek, Volleybal, Jiu-Jitsu) with subalbums per event
- About page
- Contact form
- Photo metadata (title, description, date, camera settings, location)
- Organizations/partners showcase
- Minimal & clean design

## Tech Stack

- React with TypeScript
- Vite
- Tailwind CSS v4.1
- React Router for navigation
- Dummy database (JSON data)

## Branding

- Name: Studio Storm
- Focus: Sports Photography (hoofdfocus: Atletiek, ook Volleybal en Jiu-Jitsu)
- Instagram: @studiostorm.sports
- Partners: Atletieknieuws, Agones Media, Runnerslab Athletics Team, VAL

## Development

Run `yarn dev` or use the VS Code task "Start Dev Server" to launch the development server.
The site will be available at http://localhost:5173 (or another port if in use).
